content.query:
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'tfmVerne.'
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL ManagedIdentity WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity' GO
GO
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE datalake1pgc
WITH (
    
    LOCATION = 'abfss://mdw@datalake1pgc.dfs.core.windows.net',
    CREDENTIAL = ManagedIdentity
);
GO
CREATE SCHEMA dim AUTHORIZATION dbo
GO
CREATE SCHEMA fact AUTHORIZATION dbo
